fields.name: Vital signs journal
fields.description: Journal" 100 pages of information and 100 pages of blank charting space" Natural family planning is only effective if you efficiently track your vital signs and know what to look for!" In this journal I break it down and give you plenty of room to start jotting down all of your signs!
